92.eng-name: Afflictions and the End of the World

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Ad-Dajjal will come to Medina and find the angels guarding it. So Allah willing, neither Ad-Dajjal, nor plague will be able to come near it

chapter.eng-name: Ad-Dajjal will not be able to enter Al-Madina
